Title: East Lynne
Cast: Ann Harding, Clive Brook, Conrad Nagel, Cecilia Loftus, Beryl Mercer, O.P. Heggie, Flora Sheffield, David Torrence, Wally Albright, Ronnie Cosby, Eric Mayne
Plot: The refined Lady Isabel Carlisle, after leaving her family and enduring nearly a decade of hardships, learns that her son has fallen ill. Despite being nearly blinded as the result of an explosion, she returns home to see her son again. Description: Directed by Frank Lloyd.  With Ann Harding, Clive Brook, Conrad Nagel, Cecilia Loftus. The refined Lady Isabel Carlisle, after leaving her family and enduring nearly a decade of hardships, learns that her son has fallen ill. Despite being nearly blinded as the result of an explosion, she returns home to see her son again.
